name: phantom-deeplink-utils
author: OpenRails Inc
description: Provides a convenient window.solana object and communicates with phantom wallet via a redirect flow rather than direct provider-injection.

scripts.build: yarn clean && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc-esm -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.postbuild: echo {"type":"commonjs"} | json > lib/cjs/package.json && echo {"type":"module"} | json > lib/esm/package.json
